summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; amending Section 3 of Ordinance 107801, making a change in the percentage of construction costs to be paid pursuant to an agreement or agreements with the State of Washington, Department of Transportation under the Federal Highway Act of 1970, Sections 204, "Special Bridge Replacement Program", 23 USC, Sub Section 144, for the reconstruction or rehabilitation of the Airport Way S. Viaduct over the Argo Railroad Yards.
